1.title: The First Page

choices: A lonely kid been picked on by some jerk
A student in detention with a stern teacher
11.content:
It was a normal day Sir Thomas High School most students struggled through school work eagerly waiting for the day to be over so they could go. While teachers worked as they could make sure that students leaned everything they needed to become successful in later life. Overall a very typical day for a high school however unknown everyone watching from a distance, on a branch of a might oak tree sat a fairy.

Her name was Lucy, right now she had the appearance of a bug sizes woman with peach pink hair. She could choose to any sizes but been small was useful when observing humans. At this moment she was very bored that happened when your fellow fairies had exiled you for been a "bothersome terror." It didn't help that these humans were so dull!!! Just watching was not going to be fun, but luckily Lucy with her magic would be able to have a blast playing with them, all she need was the right target.

With her tiny wings she flew down into the building, Lucy began looking for victims for her mischief. After awhile while she singled out.....
11.title: Sir Thomas High School

choices: "I wish Jack would leave me along!"
"I wish I was popular, then people would treat me better"
111.content:
Geoffrey Bright was just walking to class when suddenly out of nowhere something slammed into him hard enough that he collided with a nearby locker. Geoffrey yelled as a quick nasty jolt of pain went through his right shoulder. He muttered and looked up to see a most unwelcome sight, local bad boy and jerk Jack Hedge.

The two boys were complete opposites of each other while Geoffrey was a short; slightly pudgy boy who was a socially awkward, shy, meek, introvert with no real friends. His cloths were reflection of that plain brown slip on shoes, a pair of ugly looking grey trouser and a blue and white stripped shirt.


Jack was a big athletic guy who was lively, strong and popular. But been one of the most popular people around wasn’t enough for Jack, no sometimes he wanted punching bag and today Geoffrey was the one who got stuck with that unfortunate, 'honour .’

“Hey, weirdo!” Jack yelled in a threatening manner, “I forgot my lunch money and I need a donation.”

That was bold face lie; Jack was never short on money. It was just an excuse to be a jerk.

Geoffrey reluctantly reached into his pocket and pulled two five dollar bills, Jack gave him an annoyed before snatching the money out of his hand.

“See you later loser!” Jack then shoved Geoffrey to the ground and walked off.

Geoffrey feeling very humiliated pulled, he pulled himself up and started heading to class, visual angry. This sort of crap kept happing to him, every day Jack was there dish out some kind of abuse mostly physical, sometimes verbal always petty, at some point, it had become more of an annoying than hurtful. That fact didn’t make Geoffrey any less angry. It didn't help that no one was willing to help him because he was just the quite moody kid.

Despite his delay, Geoffrey got to class before any of the other students. The only person other in the room was the teacher Mr Green who was busy checking some homework. That gave Geoffrey about five minutes to kill before class started, so he pulled out a book he brought with him and tried to read it. Sadly he was too angry to focus on the text so he gave up and slammed the book shut in frustration. He was fed up of been a punching bag!

Meanwhile unknown to Geoffrey, Lucy the fairy was floating above invisible to human eyes. Oh boy, angry humans were one of her favourite things in the world, because it let her play one of her favourite games, Wish Granting.

In this game, a mortal would make a wish and then Lucy would try to grant it but she would always do it in a way that they didn’t except, oh the amount of fun this could provide sent a chill through Lucy’s body.

The fairy's finger glowed bright purple as she fired a tiny blot of magic into the boy.

Geoffrey suddenly felt the sudden urge to yell something to release all of pent of frustration, when it finally become too much for him he opened his mouth and cried……..
111.title: A lonely kid been picked on by some jerk

1112.content:
Meanwhile, Lucy was feeling absolute amazing that was an interesting wish, but how to twisted it. She couldn't just snap fingers and make Geoffrey popular, though she had to find a more interesting way of filling the wish. Inspiration hit the moment she saw a couple of girls enter the classroom, they were the pretty type of girl the ones that were popular with the other students. That was it!

Lucy would take that boring old Geoffrey and turn him into the ultimate high school sweetheart. A goddess of beauty who stuck love hearts of boys everywhere and who every girl secretly wanted to be. Yes by the time Lucy was done, Geoffrey would be queen and Sir Thomas High would be her court and castle.

With that settled, they were only two questions that needed to be answered one what kind of girl Geoffrey would become and when should Lucy start the transformation?


After some time Lucy decided that Geoffrey should become a……
1112.title: "I wish I was popular, then people would tr...

choices: Lucy changes Geoffrey while he is in class
11121.content: A gorgeous red head that would be perfect, if Lucy's hunch was right most of the boys here liked red heads so turning Geoffrey into one would be a great way to maximises popularity. But there was one last thing that Lucy’s needed to consider, was when the transformation should take place, on one hand, she was really eager to get started right now but on the other hand waiting a bit longer for a juicy moment might be much more fun.
11121.title: A gorgeous red head

111212.content: Does she change Geoffrey during swimming class?
111212.title: Lucy changes Geoffrey later

choices: Olivia is a new student but already very popular
1112121.content:
When Lucy sees Geoffrey entering the boys locker room, she knows that this is her moment. Fluttering through the closing door, she casts a spell to prevent interruptions during the transformation. With a second cast, Geoffrey's transformation begins to take place.

As Geoffrey opens his locker, Geoffrey loses his overweightness and gains a more petite and toned figure. Filled with energy, Geoffrey quickly removes his clothing and puts on his swim suit.

However, his suit stretches around his body to its more feminine counterpart. Two mounds of soft flesh begin to push out from Geoffrey's chest as his hair lengthes, softens, and shades to a nice red color. As his hair stops just above his lower back, his new breasts finish athe a bountiful D-cup.

Confused, Geoffrey runs to the door, but can not open it for some reason. Then he loses his balance as his waist caves in and his hips flare out. His ass rounds into a delicate bubble butt. His penis is pulled inward forming a new vagina.

Olivia (formerly Geoffrey) feels a wave of tingles across her face as it changes to a softer, more feminine look. With the transformation complete, Olivia stands very carefully, still adjusting to her new center of gravity. With a creak, the locker room door opens and Olivia begins panicks.

Fortunately for her....

If reality has shifted with Olivia, the boys locker room becomes the girls locker room.

If Olivia is the new student, the locker room is still the boys, but no one makes a big deal about it.
1112121.title: Yes

choices: A girl came in, because Geoffrey had been teleported into the girl's bathroom
A boy came in, Geoffrey was still in the boy's bathroom
11121221.content:
The time was 12:15 Geoffrey was washing his hands today's humiliation been pushed to the back of his mind, unfortunately, his day was about to get worse.

Above him Lucy finally lost her patience, she just couldn’t help it the amount of fun and creative of opportunity just couldn’t be missed. Without a note of hesitation, she shouts a tiny beam of purple magic out of finger into Geoffrey’s body.

Geoffrey's body suddenly felt icy cold as his body jerked uncontrollably. He would have fallen face first onto the floor. If he hadn’t used the sink to support himself. He tried to pull himself up but was forced to knees when suddenly every single muscle in his body felt like each one had been injected with a tonne of lead.

Around the same time, Geoffrey’s vision started to become so messy that everything in view became a blur of grey. His chest felt extremely tight, as the boy’s temperate flipped from icy cold to burning hot. The pressure of this bizarre illness becomes too much for Geoffrey and he collapsed.

Later Geoffrey returned to the land of the living, his head spinning as pulled himself up and was immediately dumbstruck by the sight of the most beautiful girl he had ever seen. Her hair was red as autumn, along with slick mane that reached past her shoulders, her eyes were a majestic sapphire blue and her nose was of the pin button variety and which looked great alongside her large perky lips. Her skin was flawless, perfectly smooth and healthy. Her hands had long delicate fingers with long well-manicured nails. She was wearing a light green tight camisole which seemed designed to emphasise her impressive chest and black skirt with a white belt around it.

‘What is a pretty girl like doing in the boy's bathroom’ Geoffrey thought as the skin his face became warm with an uncomfortable feeling, the girl's face turned red, not surprising he if had accidentally walked into the wrong in the bathroom he would feel embarrassed too.

Geoffrey raised his hand to greet the girl, who did the same. It took him about a second to notice that hand in view wasn’t his when he did look of uneasy appeared on the girl's face. He looked down to see that she now large boobs on her chest.

“Holy sh…” Geoffrey covered her mouth as the voice that came out it was completely different from her normal one.

Ok this had to be some kind of weird dream, all she had to was pinch herself and Geoffrey would wake up in bed as his normal self.

She held out her arm and pinched it as hard she could, there was a tiny sharp pain and…... Geoffrey didn’t wake up and was still a girl.

“What the hell is going on?!” Geoffrey yelled while shaking. She needed to lie down.

But suddenly she heard the creaking sound of the bathroom door been pushed open.
11121221.title: The Change

choices: Mark and Geoffrey start making a plan
111212212.content:
"Ah!" A slightly high-pitched voice cried out.


Geoffrey turned around to see that the person that had just entered was Mark Stream, a classmate of Geoffrey. Like Geoffrey, Mark was a bit nerd and social outcast so they naturally the two got along well, they weren’t friends exactly but when they need someone to complain to, they would always lend each other an ear.


“Um,” Mark said awkwardly while his shifted around the bathroom, his turning the lightest shade of red possible.




“I know this is hard to believe but it's me, Geoffrey,” the boy turned the girl, tried to explain the strange situation, unsurprisingly Mark wasn’t conceived.


“If you don’t believe me, then just let me remind of that little event last year, which we agreed to keep a secret .”


Mark’s face widened with shock, before shifting to an expression to one of annoyance, “Ok, ok I believe but how the hell did this happen?”



Geoffrey opened her mouth to speak…...
111212212.title: Mark

choices: Geoffrey gets dragged all the way to the cafeteria.
1112122122.content:
Unfortunately, before any plan could from Lucy got an another funny idea if Geoffrey was going to be the queen of the school she would need an ally, a friend/minion that would do whatever she asked and Mark had just volunteered. Lucy pointed her finger at Mark and just like before, fired a tiny blast of magic out of it. The tiny beam hit its target dead on.

Mark’s body began jolting and shaking as it was changed. His short black hair began stretching into a long thick mane of silky locks that went far past his shoulders, then its colour shifted to a light brown. His legs grew in length becoming thinner and fitter while her waist grew in size. At the same time, her face changes into much pretty one complete with a button nose and blue eyes. Her arms then started undergoing a transformation similar to her legs becoming finer, while her hands became more delicate and her fingernails grew longer. Finally, a large pair of breasts pushed out from her chest.

While her body changed, her clothing transformed to fit her new body. Her simple white sneakers morphed into a pair of brown leather, her baggy trouser mega red together and shortened until they were a mini skirt, which changes from an ugly light grey to a snow white colour, with a brown leather with golden buckle added for extra flourish.

Her blue t-shirt tightened and turned the same white as the skirt. A dark brown jacket unzipped, popped into existence creating a perfect colour balance. To complete the picture a pair of silver hooped earrings appeared on her earlobes.

Mark looked down at her transformed body, her mouth wide open, her big eyes filled with terror. Then all signs of fear melted away, her expression became completely blank for a few seconds, then life returned to her. A bubbly energetic smile appeared on her face while her blue partially sparkled.

“Liz, what you doing in the boy's bathroom?” The girl’s voice was completely different from Mark’s, a cute happy one perfectly reflected her face.

Geoffrey started in shock, confusion and horror, “Mark you o….Wait who the hell is Liz?”

Mark our whoever she was now, ignored Geoffrey question and grabbed her hand.

“We, don’t have time to talk! Clare Gale is currently making the moves on Jake!”

Before Geoffrey could object the girl that used to be called Mark, dragged her out of the bathroom into the hall….
1112122122.title: Beta

choices: Lucy cause all of Elizabeth's insult to become true.
11121221222.content:
Geoffrey struggled to get her hand free, no matter how much she the girl who used to be Mark just kept Geoffrey’s arm trapped in an iron grip. The odd thing was that she didn’t she seem to be trying or even notice Geoffrey’s obvious distress, no she just kept smiling with excitement like a little kid in a candy store.

“Mark, wait…..” Before she could get another word out, Geoffrey was shoved into the caffeate, almost falling over. For a moment the redhead looked around bracing herself for inevitable hopeful looks of the guys and subtle jealous starts of the girls every time a new pretty girl showed up. This was always followed by rapid rumours, various clicks trying to recruit the pretty girl and the part that Geoffrey dread the most guys would start lining up to hit on her. The very thought of being asked out by one of the jerks that picked on her made Geoffrey cringe, suddenly felt a less ashamed about never having the courage to ask a girl out.

But strangely, that wasn’t what happened. Instead, no one noticed Geoffrey or Mark enter the room. The answer as to why became clear when Geoffrey turned looks in the same direction as everyone else. Jake was sitting at a table with a smile on his face while Clare Gale the beautiful and popular head of the gymnastics club was whispering into his ear. She combed her ebony black hair while smirking arrogantly.


Suddenly Geoffrey felt a surge of something powerful erupted within her. It was jealousy, a hot intense jealousy that overtook everything else. The fact that she was supposed to be a guy, Jake treating Geoffrey like garbage, the fact she had bigger things to worry about. All become trivial by the scene unfolding in front of her.

The only thing that mattered to Elizabeth Keep was that some bitch was putting the moves on her man! Well, she wasn’t going to stand for that!

Elizabeth turned to her ‘friend’ Madison Walker and smirked. Madison returned the smirk and the two girls marched to confront their opponent.

“Hello Clare,” Elizabeth said a sugar sweet voice.

Clare looked away from Jake with annoyed expression, that was quickly switched out for a false smile.

“Why, Elizabeth it is nice to see you.” The fact that everyone recognised her girl form had no effect on Elizabeth.

Meanwhile, Lucy was feeling absolutely giddy. Oh, nothing was quite as fearsome as two human woman fight over the same man! She couldn’t wait to throw her magic into the mix.
11121221222.title: Cat Fight!

11123.title: Option B

111232.content: Will Lucy turn Geoffrey into a really hot goth of the school?
111232.title: A Hot Goth Chick

1112322.content:
Lucy was feeling like one of the classics today.

She'd turn Geoffrey into a ridiculously hot, bubble brained blonde.

On the plus side, guys would have to be insane to try to bully her, and would be near or at the top of the social microcosm that was high schools food chain.

The downside was that she would be incredibly dim and easy to manipulate by anyone........at which point Lucy realised that 'she' counted as anyone as well.
1112322.title: An airheaded blonde

choices: Turn him into the Queen Bee.
11123222.content:
She was tempted to empty his brain into his chest and turn him into the essential blonde bimbo, but she had an idea.

She liked the idea of not only twisting his wish, but punishing these meatheads.

She decided to turn Geoffrey not into just any girl in the school, but 'the' girl.

The Queen Bee. The Alpha bitch. The top of the food chain. The student body president. The captain of the cheer squad. The paper editor. The head diva. Any way you slice it it, in movies they were pretty much all the same person.

A rich daddy's girl who'd always gotten what she wanted her entire life, and had the good fortune to not only be hotter, bustier and generally just sexier than every other girl around her, but smarter than anyone would suspect and had a superiority complex born of a lifetime of deserved and undeserved praise that meant she would crush anyone who got in her way.....or simply because she wanted to entertain herself.

The quintessential mean girl.

Yes. Having a girl like that around. To reap the benefits of being friends with. To whisper in the ear of. To have others make wishes about both good and bad that she could twist right around for better and worse.

Yes. She could enjoy making him into a girl like that
11123222.title: The Queen Bee

A brunette tomboy.. Whom is well liked and but is more like the boys then the girls.

Does kick boxing and climbing outside of school but is also forced to do gymnastics and swimming in school as well as soccer but she likes that.

Wears jeans and hoodie all the time but her mother makes her wear feminine bra's and panties underneath them...
111232222.title: Mmmm Naaaahhh

1112322221.content:
Lucy turned Geoffrey into a tomboy girl that is called Jennifer or Jen...

Everyone likes her and she's the kind of person who can float between different crowds.

The cheerleaders keep trying to get her to join the squad but Jen has no interest in prancing around in a short skirt although she appreciates the hard work they put into the routines they do.

Anyway Lucy has decided to make sure Geoffrey goes to the high school dance due to peer pressure....

No one has ever seen Jen in a dress, make up or fully done up before....

Geoffrey is sat in the class and Lucy waves her magic dust then disappeared never to be seen again.

Geoffrey is sat in class by himself and after slamming the book down the teacher looked at you and said "Jen are you OK" you look up thinking she said "Jeff are you OK" and said....

I'm annoyed Miss... "call me Marie honey no one's around" the teacher sat next to you as you let everything out"

You started by saying I feel like I have no friends, no future and I don't know what to do...

Marie said "Jen you have lots of people that like you, including most of the teachers in the school.... You have a very bright future ahead of you and you are top of every class you are very intelligent"...

Suddenly you looked down and saw to protruding lumps in your hoodie been held by something and your jeans although slightly baggy they are tight in places and you can feel a soft fabric between your legs and you are wearing boots sort of like army or Dr Martin boots.

The bell went off and you didn't have time to contemplate anything as people came into the class and everyone from the cheerleaders to the nerds said hello to you.

The nerds and geeks like you because you play risk and on line with them and the cheerleaders like you because you don't treat them like trash or sluts.

The guys like you because you are very independent and won't take any shit or anyone guys or girls.

But usually you just do your school work and go home, you are not one to stick around and mingle after school.

Only a few people have been you fully naked and they are some of the cheerleaders that go to the same gym and swimming pool as you.

They are always impressed at how physically fit you are but don't understand why you don't show your body off.

Unknown to you some of the girls have decided to apply peer pressure on you starting today so they can get you to the high school dance and thank you for all the emotional help you've given them through the year.

Plus they think a break from school work will do you some good....

1113.content: Geoffrey suddenly felt the sudden urge to yell something to release all of pent of frustration, when it finally become too much for him he opened his mouth and cried……..
1113.title: Geoffrey wishes part 2

choices: Make her the new student of the school.
Give her the power to change her body into who ever she sees
113.content:
During her search, the she spotted one individual that would be perfect to toy around with. Down at the hallway is a middle age woman of sixty with black and white hair done up in a bun, a think and lanky body, and had elegant glasses on her wrinkled face. She was also wearing a professional suit with a consecutive blouse and gray vest, gray skirt that goes all the way down to her feet, and a pair of comfy three inch heel shoes. Her name is Veronica Winchester, but the students always call her Principal Veronica because of the strict respect they have for her.

Every morning, she surveys the hallway to make sure the students are going to class on time. Walking down the hall, she spotted a group of girls that looked too skimpy for school and called them out.

"You three!" she said in a stern tone, "What is the meaning of this? Dressing up like that is against school policy."

One of the girls wearing a tube tank top and a short skirt that goes up near her upper thigh turned to her and said, "Oh please, Principal Veronica. We are only wearing this because all the young pop stars are today. Maybe you should ease up a little be and be what it's like to be a student. Then maybe you won't have to be a stick in the mud."

The principal scrounged her face a bit and said, "Ease up a bit? I have an obligation in making sure these students have a refine future ahead of them, and not act like a bunch of sluts. Perhaps you three should ease up on your own, in Detention for a week. That sounds fair."

The three were silent as the girl in the tube tank top slouched and said, "Fine... Whatevs... C'mon girls, let's ditch this place and head to the locker room. There's something I want to show you." The two girls nodded as they left the principle on her own.

As soon as they are gone, Veronica sighed and said, "These kids, always thinking less on studies and college and more of these, celebrities and doing on these wasteful social media crap. I miss those days were students are more behaved and less rebellious. If only I can understand what it's like to be them, or what it's like to live in their world, then maybe I can understand them better and know what needs to be done."

As she said that, Lucy looked on in the distance and heard every word from this principal. It sounded like she can't stand the students behavior and is overworked and stressed out on the whole thing. If Veronica can be like these students or live in the world they do, then maybe she could make some changes. Hearing all of this, Lucy gave a light giggle and said, "So the principal wants to help the student body out, eh? Well, I'll give her all the help she needs. I just need to figure out what to do with her." So she thought of a way to give the principal a chance to help the student body of the school. She had so many options, she doesn't know which one is best. What can she choose?
113.title: The Strange Life of Principal Veronica

choices: Place a curse on her so she becomes a princiapl by day and teen by night
Give her the power to switch herself and a person she choose by touch.
1133.content: Any plans on what Lucy wants to do with Veronica?
1133.title: More Choices

11331.content:
Lucy thought of what to do, but came up with a really good idea. See, faeries not only offer powers and gifts, they would also place curses to those that are bad. Sometimes the curses are for bad luck, accidents, or something worse. But Lucy likes to use curses as a way to have fun at the expense of others. It is one of the reason why she was kicked out of the forest in the first place. Placing a curse on Veronica is no exception. Giving that this principal is very strict with her students and tried to teach them a little lesson. "If this principal wants to treat her students like that," she said with glee, "Then she would be like them."

With a quick wave of her wand, a red piece of energy came out of it and whispered an incantations. That magic soon came out of the want and flew to the principal where students and teachers don't notice it. When the magic spiral around her, it came into contact and caught her by surprise. She felt a tingle for a few seconds before it could stop, as she wondered what happened. "Whoa! What was that?" she asked after feeling that tingle. After a few seconds, she shrugged it off and said, "Must be the air conditioning. They always act up like that. I have to speak to maintenance to fix it. I swear, those air conditioners just give me chills every time I pass by them." She soon walked away to moved on with her business.

Meanwhile, Lucy looked on and was pleased with what she has planned. See, the curse she placed on Veronica is a day and night curse. By day, she will be a pricipal of the school. But by night, when the sun sets and the moon is high, she will change into a teenage girl and gets to spend a full night as one until the morning comes. This will teach her what happens when you treat students like their nothing. She will live in their shoes and get use to it all night. Now she needs to see if her curse works. The question is, where will the curse starts?
11331.title: Principal by Day, Teen Girl by Night

choices: Raised his staff and zapped Frenda with magic
Reached into his bag and pulled an object out of it
Lunge forward to force the ring onto Frenda's finger
Before he could do anything, Frenda attacks him
12.content:
Frenda was a beautiful peasant girl, her blonde hair was long wild gorgeous, her eyes were a brilliant emerald green, her skin was smooth and healthy as a maiden of her age could hope to be, creating an appearance that looked good even when wearing bland brown peasant clothing. Her life was a peaceful one, she was the apple of her parent's eyes, her village was happy and was thriving. Everyone loved her thanks to kind and generous nature.



To put things simply, Frenda life was mostly perfect the only thing she could really complain about it got boring every now and then; she sometimes desired to go on some grand adventure like the stories that her mother used to tell her when she was a very young child.



These were the kind of thoughts running through her head, while she was resting in the of a middle wheat a field, when she spotted a figure in the distance, a tall thin man wearing a hooded sinister dark grey cloak, carrying a plain wooden oak staff and had over bag over one shoulder.



Frenda pulled herself up as the man approached, "Who are you?" She asked reluctantly.



The man pulled his hood off, revealing a truly ugly old face. The nose was long with a slight hook, the teeth were unpleasant yellow and brown, the forehead was covered in massive gross warts and his short hair was grey as spider webbing.



"My lady," The man said while bowing polity. “My name is Grant Casket; I am a great and powerful wizard and Lord of Grey Might Castle!” A snake like a smile appeared as his right hand reached into the grey cloak and pulled out a golden ring with a shiny red ruby at its centre. “Frenda your beauty has become legendary throughout the land, you deserve far better than any petty king or feeble prince, only someone of my power will suit you!” The old man dramatically fell to his knees and placed the ring in the palm of his hand, “Become my bride and I will take you away from this drudgery of this remote peasant village take you to live in Grey Might Castle where you be provided with anything your heart’s desires.”



“No,” Frenda replied bluntly.



Casket looked like a lightning bolt had just struck him, “you reject me! Why is it my ugly appearances?”



Frenda shock her, “I reject you because you are some random stranger, that came out of nowhere asking me to leave behind every I have ever know, to live in some faraway place which I have never heard of, you talk about me as if I am just a trophy and you calm to be some kind of ‘wizard’ yet I see no reason to believe word you just said, which means you are either crazy or a liar!”





Casket face twisted with anger as he gripped his hand into a tight fist, “You dare doubt my power, you think I am !” He yelled with all the fury of an angry lion.


Frenda started slowly moving backwards, trying very hard to keep herself from being overwhelmed the panic created by the sense of danger coming from Casket.


“If you want proof of my magic fine! I will show you obnoxious!”



His ranting completes the wizard…...
12.title: The Land Magical of Caswyria

choices: She had been truned  into a cat
She been turned into a different animal
She been turned into a horse
121.content:
The staff in Casket's hand glowed a sinister purple. Frenda turned and began to rush away, there ominous crackle and a bolt of magical energy shot out of the staff and struck her in the back. Frenda cried with as her body slipped into unconsciousness.

A short time later she awoke to find that....
121.title: Raised his staff and zapped Frenda with magic

choices: "I have need of a new familiar,"  Use his magic to bind Frenda to his will
While Casket  is trying to decide what to do Frenda tries to steal the staff
1211.content:
Frenda awoke from her sleep everything looked very damn weird, at first, she thought it was just because of her spinning from the blast but as her head cleared up the real horrifying reason become clear.

Everything was bigger from the trees in distance to the reeds of wheat to the wizard Casket, who now lured over Frenda, a cruel crooked smile fixed upon his face.

“What did you do to me?!” Frenda demanded in a strange higher pitch version of her own voice.
Casket grinned, “look down.”

Frenda did look and instantly regret the action. What she saw wasn’t human feet but paws covered in golden fur; she turned around to find that that a long bushy tail was now. She had been transformed into a cat!

Casket chuckled cruel, “Now what should I do with you, kitty?”
1211.title: Cat!!!

choices: Casket drops the staff letting Frenda take control of its magic
Casket tries to cast a spell which back fires in some way
12112.content:
Casket kept laughing cruel at the cat that used to be a girl, a rightful punishment for being a defiant brat.

However the old wizard was so busy congratulating himself that he failed to notice that Frenda had regained her barrings and was more than little livid at the wizard for turning her into a feline. Seeing her chances Frenda jumped up with furious agile legs onto Casket staff.

The old crone's laughter gave way immediately to shock which result in....
12112.title: Staff Stealing

choices: Frenda transforms herself back to normal
Frenda use the staff on Casket
Frenda loose control of the magic and something odd happens
121121.content:
Casket was so startled by the the girl turned feline sudden resistance, he let go of the staff allowing Frenda to grasp it in her mouth. She suddenly started to feel incredibly energised as magically power flowed through her entire being, Frenda on longer felt like a regular person, she was now something greater!

As the power overwhelmed her, Frenda closed her eyes and focused.
121121.title: Casket drops the staff letting Frenda take cont...

choices: Frenda transforms herself into a powerful sorceress
Frenda turns Casket into an animal
1211211.content:
There was a bright flash of light and Frenda was back to her lovely human self but that was only true on a surface level, if one were to gaze into her eyes they would sparks of magical power.

“Give it back!” Casket demand angrily while shaking his fits futile at the girl.

Frenda roll her eyes and smiled, “You are in no position to make demands, but you seem to be the kind of person who is use to getting his way, the kind of person who loves bully anyone who defies you into submission, however I’m the one with the power now!”

Frenda looked at her staff and began wondering what she could do with her new found power.
1211211.title: Frenda transforms herself back to normal

choices: Isabella appears near city and starts adventuring
Days later Casket raven familiar is out looking for him
12112111.content:
Frenda raised the staff above her head, a surge of purple light began to echo through the girl’s then it rapidly began to change. Frenda’s body began to elongate as it started to take on a much slimmer and muscle build.

In a matter of seconds, Frenda had gone from pretty young girl to gorgeous woman. Her humble peasant clothes had been replaced by a fine royal purple and silver slick hooded cloak that was designed emphasize her main attractive qualities like. Like her long wild golden mane, her ample chest and shiny silver eyes.


Casket stepped back in both shock and fear, he knew the girl had potential but he never thought even in his wildest dreams that something like this was even possible.

The new sorceress waved her hands and a shiny silver mirror appeared in her hand from a puff of smoke, she spent a moment admiring her changed appearance.

“I feel amazing,” Frenda’s voice hand gained a strange otherworldly quality, “This new power is incredible there is no way I could go back to being a mere peasant girl.”


She spent another few seconds looking at herself vainly in the mirror, before turning her full attention back to Casket.

“Now about your punishment now I could just vaporize you but I’m very good mood and I need someone to take over my former place, it would be cruel to leave my parents without a daughter.”


A look of horror appeared on the old man’s face as he immediately turned around and began to leg it. Frenda simple pointed her staff at Casket and fire a beam of magical purple energy in the old man’s back.

His body started shifting, first, he started to decrease in height and size while his wrinkly fade away, leaving behind the soft healthy youthful skin. His messy grey hair explored into a mane of golden blond hair. Final his body was completely reshaped into that of a young girl. A girl that looked just like Frenda before she got her powers.

The new Frenda looked around in confuse before rubbing her head.

“What happened?” The new Frenda asked.

“You had quite the fall and I helped you up,” The Sorceress explained.

“That was most kind of you, what is your name?” The girl bowed.

A new name, yes that would be appropriate, “You may call me Isabella.”

“Sorry but I must be getting home Isabella.”


Isabella watched as the new Frenda rushed home, leaving Isabella free full embrace her new life as a sorceress. She snapped her fingers and teleported away in flash of blue light.
12112111.title: Frenda transforms herself into a powerful sorce...

choices: Frenda and Casket have fused together into a catgirl wizard
121122.content:
Casket willed magic into the staff causing it to glow and crackle with blue light.

"Oh....!" The wizard was cut off by the staff cracking open, followed by a thunders boom!!!! and a massive wall of blue smoke knocking before he and Frenda unconscious.

When the smoke settled,,,,,,
121122.title: The Back Fire

choices: The two minds fight so much that they bleed into each and a new mind is created
1211221.content:
After the smoke dissipated, a young woman wearing grey clock stood up slowly while rubbing her head which was still clouded by confusion and irritating pain. Her appearance was very unusual; she had a pair of pointy ears cover in golden fur near the top of her head, which blended perfectly with her long wild mane of blond hair. Her green eyes were much large than those of an ordinary person, with massive pupils that made them look like beautiful finely cut gemstones. Instead nails her hands were armed with impressive sharp claws.

"What happened?" Frenda started, “and…Where did that stupid girl go!” Casket finished.

The woman cover her mouth, as she began to dread to feel a sense of dread, which immediately turned into terror once she noticed the sharp claws that replaced her nails. “Damn it I have been fused…..With that insane wizard!” Frenda yelled as she struggled to move the body back to her home.

“I can’t stay here I need to get….Back to the castle......and fix this mess! “Casket declared angrily as he forced the body to move in dictation of his castle, but all progress was halted when Frenda took control back and turned the body in the over direction.

The cat person clutched her head and began fumbling around and tripping over herself as the peasant girl and the old wizard fought each clash in a clash of wills until…..
1211221.title: Fusion!

choices: Investigate the nearby village it felt familiar so there might be some clues
Go back to castle the ritual clearly is the key to the mystery
12112211.content:
Frenket pushed all thoughts about the foolish human aside and started to heading back to Grey Might castle when she suddenly realised something. She had no what she was doing here in the middle of nowhere, the cat girl began straining her mind as she tried to find the answer. The closer she got was some vague memories about a ritual that involves the wedding somehow.

The situation only got worse as Frenket began to notice that stories in her memory, she was a wizard, a cat woman and the Lady of Grey Might castle but that was it. Clearly, the accident had caused had caused Frenket to lose most of her memories.

Frenket and growled like an irritated lioness, making a new staff had to wait right getting her memories back was more important.

After a fair amount of time debating with herself, Frenket decides to…..
12112211.title: Frenket

choices: Frenda hears some one walking towards the stable.
Another horse walks up to the stable .
1213.content: Frenda woke up and felt very strange she felt huge, she looked down and noticed that she was standing on shiny black hooves. She screamed and was surprised to hear her own voice my god im a horse. He turned me into a horse she yelled please change me back there was no answer. She looked around trying to figure out where she was. She looked there was a food and water trough at the end of the stable she was in she yelled out again some one please help me, no one answered. She walked over to the water trough it felt very strange walking on four legs rather than the two legs she was used too. She lowered her head towards the water trough she saw her reflection in the water there was a white horses head looking back at her. This can't be real she said I must be dreaming. She tried to push open the door it was locked she yelled out again some one please help me.
1213.title: She been turned into a diffrent animal

choices: Frenda trys to talk to the wizard.
Cara lets Frenda out of the stable and shows her around.
12132.content: Frenda called out again then she heard the sound of hooves getting closer. She then saw a Horses head appear at the stable door. The horse said hello there my name is Cara, Frenda said did the wizard change you into a horse as well Cara said yes and there are some more like us. How many more are you talking Cara said you are number six now . Oh wow that many is there any way we can be changed back not that I know of, one of the others has been a horse for three years. How long have you been here almost two months now Cara said. It gets easier your instincts will change by this time tomorrow you will love being a horse. What if we get hold of his magic staff how do you plan on doing that you no longer have hands. We have to try something I don't want to be stuck like this, you will change your mind trust me.
12132.title: Another horse walks up to the stable .

choices: An exhibition featuring early medieval jewel, weapons and other items
An exhibition about the golden age of piracy
13.content:
A large yellow school bus, parked outside the steps to The Great Midway Museum of History. It was a grand old building that had been teaching people about the past for over a hundred. The subjects ranged from prehistory to modern times, its collection features all kinds of interesting items including dinosaur fossils, gold jewellery ancient Egypt, armour that once belonged to a medieval knight and much much more.

The students from Redhill High Shool exited the bus, in groups. The Museum was very big so to make sure that no one got lost the teachers told everyone to get into groups, almost everyone got into a group that had least, one friend. With the expectation of one girl named Erika Goto, she was shy, quiet and had trouble interacting with people.

Erika was the kind of person of who would rather spend time reading a good book than go out for a party, as a result she had a reputation in her previous school for being a creepy loner the fact she had to wear glass didn't help either.

As result of that reputation, Erika was the victim of serious bullying. To the point when offered to be part of student exchange program Erika jumped at the chance. Since coming to Redhill things had improved for her, at least now Erika was left along.

But she still had to join a group, so Erika basically moved up to the group closest to her and inserted herself into that group no one noticed. The other members of the group were Lacy Smith leather girl with a thing for fashion and photography, Jess Grey a rebel bag girl who wore a stereotypical black leather jacket and Bill Stable an average guy who really hated history as a subject.

Since each group was allowed to explore the museum at their own pace Erika's group decide to go to.......
13.title: The Great Midway Museum of History

133.content: You decide to take a tour of ancient mythology. As you pass through the hallway you see signs pointing to several different cultures. Looking at the sign you decide to head to the...
133.title: An exhibition about world mythology

choices: The Mills go to a clothing store
The Mills go to a jewellery store
The Mills go to a toy store
The Mills go to a different kind of store
14.content:
The people Eastwood Town where dived on the new Wonder Mall, some viewed as annoying loud bringing annoying out of town people, like files to rotten crops, while the other half saw it an opportunity that helps bring some jobs and convenience to the humble town. The Mill family were in the latter group with one expectation. Naturally, the Mills were among the first to visit the Wonder Mall on its grand opening.

Mills were made up of four people plus the family pet a black cat with green eye called Lance.

Firstly there was Matthew Mills a successful lawyer that liked to always keep up appearance even outside of work. As such he went out today wearing his smart black business suit, equal smart black trousers, a pair of skinny black shoes complete with an emerald green tie. His brown hair was neatly combed, his face well shaven and he had a nice tall body.


Matthew’s wife Jan Mills was secretary of a to some big shot at a company in the big city, which made clothing. She was a pretty woman with green eyes, long curly blond hair, big lips and fairly long neck. She was wearing a white blouse, a long black skirt and black high heeled shoes.

The youngest human member of the family was Kimberlee, a cute seven-year-old and girly girl. She had the appearance of one to, with her blond hair styled into a cute ponytail and a long sleeved pink shirt with a blue heart on it, a pink skirt and cute little mary jane shoes.

Finally, Kimberlee’s older brother James, thirteen years old with brown hair and green eyes, wearing a dark green t-shirt, a pair of jeans and white velcro sneakers. James was the one person in the family who was happy to be here. There was simply nothing more born in the youngs lads mind than work around shops and wasting hours of time looking at boring mundane items, like clothes or shaves or golf clubs or dolls.

But his protests were ignored and now he was forced to come along on this stupid trip.

Mills walked through the huge automatic glass doors. The Wonder Mall was truly massive four floors tall, connected by many escalators. The white tile floors were shiny, fresh and clean. Shops could be seen far as the eye could see. Every store boastfully displayed their wares in glass window displays.

“Ok, everyone,” Jan said cheerfully, “It’s time decide where we should go first!”


James rolled his eyes did they really needed to have ‘a group talk’ about this they were just walking around a mall.

Eventually, the Mill’s decide to…...
14.title: The Wonder Mall

141.content:
Much James annoyance his family had decided to go to the clothing store. Cloth shopping was by far the most boring kind of shopping ever, nothing could be any less pleasant than having to waste vulnerable time watching his mum and Kimblee go nuts over a bunch of fabric pieces while his dad just nodded along.

James decided that if he was going to be stuck in a clothing store, he might as well stretch his legs. As the boy walked around the clothing store he came across a…..
141.title: Clothing Store

choices: The business suit, skirt and wig fly off the mannequin towards James
1411.content:
A grey female business suit and skirt with golden buttons, a very expanse with a price tag of $ 500. “Seriously!” James said, that much for two pieces of fabric, why would anyone no matter how rich would spend that much money on clothing.

James started at the business suit and mannequin displaying with annoyance. It was a bit creepy with its flawless shiny pitch black plastic skin, the featureless face and uncanny realistic looking red haired wig.

James eventually became creeped out enough that he decided to walk away when suddenly…...
1411.title: A business suit

choices: His shoes are replaced with heels
Underneath the skirt, his underwear turns into panties
14111.content:
Having enough of the bizarre mannequin, James began to walk away from it, deciding to better spend his time elsewhere. However, as he did, he paused when he heard something like shifting behind him. Instantly, he turned around, only to see nothing out of ordinary. Great, now this place was messing with his head.

"Seriously, this whole mall is weird," he mumbled to himself. It really would have been better had he just stayed home.

He turned around to keep walking, when he heard shifting and clanking again. He turned around again, once again seeing nothing odd. He groaned a bit, deciding to just pick up the pace and get out before anything else happened. However, right as he did, he tripped, yelling a bit as he hit the ground hard.

"OW! What the...." he groaned, turning back at his feet....only to gasp out in shock.

There was cloth grabbing his legs, and it kind of looked familiar. Before James could ask what was happening, he happened to look back up at the mannequin. Wait, where were its clothes?! The emotionless statue was completely bare, and with what seemed like the skirt judging from the color around his legs. Now James was really worried about what was going on.

"What the hell is this?!" he groaned out loud, struggling to get up and pull the skirt off him. However, when he looked back up, something else stood out. "Wait, where is the wig?"

Right as that happened, something aggressively lopped on to James's head, making him yell out and struggle as he pulled at it, feeling long hair. Getting an eye on it, he could see it was the long red hair that the statue had, a length that went past his own shoulders and down his back. It was almost like dealing with a wild animal as he pulled and pulled at it, the thing fighting back like it had a will of its own.

"Get the hell of me-OW!" he cried out as he gave the wig one big tug at the end.

Right as this happened though, he could see the skirt flying around him, wrapping around his waist and over his jeans. It pressed tighter and tighter, as he tried to use one hand to pull at it. Like the wig, it didn't let up though, snugging around him. However, what happened next was even weirder, Almost as if by some supernatural force, his jeans became undone and slid down his legs, causing him to pull his feet out of them and leaving the skirt as his only legwear.

"What the?! Did this thing just...take my pants off?" he spoke out, still dealing with the wig and barely being able to deal with this.

However, right at that moment, another thing tacked him, apparently the grey suit jacket just wrapped around him, pulling his arms away from his head forcibly. He groaned as his his arms were held out as the jacket slid itself up his arms, going around him until it was snug on his torso. The front lightly wrapped around, the golden buttons fastening themselves.

And just like that, he was wrapped in the female business suit, still with his velcro shoes and what he had on underneath the suit, his jeans laying on the floor. What in the world just happened? He was left more or less silent, letting the red hair just flow down uninterrupted.

"What just happened?" he asked himself incredulously.

However, it didn't seem to be done. After he asked that, he felt a shifting underneath the jacket, he looked down, seeing his dark green shirt shifting on his body. He brought a hand to it, wondering what was happening, until he felt how soft it was now. The color was shifting to a shade of bright blue, while also splitting down the middle and buttoning itself back up in what could only be described as a blouse.

Now James was really confused. Just what were these clothes? And this hair...

"OW!" he yelped again as he grabbed at it. It felt like....pulling his own hair.

Wait, what happened to his old hair? He pulled at the hair again, feeling no resistance like before. Instead it was like his old hair never existed and that this red hair was real.....
14111.title: The business suit, skirt and wig fly off the ma...

choices: More changes happen before James can even move
James is strangely able to walk in his new foot wear with easy
141111.content:
At this point James complete lost it, and started to cry all he did was bad mouth a set of cloths and now he was stuck wearing them but been forced wear a grown woman's clothing was a small grip compared to his hair replaced! He need get help!

James started turning around to search for his parents when suddenly he felt a strange pressure on his feet. The lad looked down very reluctantly and saw that his shoes were in process of changing, it's pure show white coloring was quickly been infected with of blots of black while toes became more pointed in shape, then ground started moving further from the James as the heels began to rise.

With in a few seconds James shoes had been trued into a pair of elegant feminine black high heels. "Oh shit! James yelled, if his shoes could be replaced that meant anything could be replaced even his....

James didn't even want to think about it.... He need find his parents and fast!
141111.title: His shoes are replaced with heels

choices: James was approached by Kimberlee, who wanted show off her new ring
James decide to look around the shop
142.content:
Brilliant Gems was clearly trying to give a fancy feel. You tell by the fact that the shop's name was written in fancy golden in a black sigh.

This looked carried to the inside, where many gorgeous shiny gems of many colours were displayed proudly in glass cases. Each gem had been interested into golden, silver or some other metal.

Naturally being a lover of everything pretty Kimberlee was over the moon staring at the shiny rocks with a look of childish sparkly glee. Meanwhile, James's parents were talking about buying a present for a friend.

Meanwhile, James just lined against a pillar with a bored look on his face. Damn this was so dull! James wanted nothing more than to leave and go but he was stuck, while his family made googly eyes at some shiny rocks.

After skulking for a while….
142.title: Brilliant Gems

choices: James starts changing as the Mill's explore the Wonder Mall
Nothing happens until the Mills get home
1421.content:
“Hey, James take a look at this!” Kimberlee then proceeds to almost shove a shiny silver ring with a dark blue diamond cut into it, into her brother's face.

“Mother bought for me!” She smiled gleefully, her voice had so much energy it felt like it was going to burst into a fiery explosion of sweetness.

James sighed in frustration and pushed Kimberlee’s hand away. “Kimberlee I really don't care, if mum waste money on your stupid little whims.”


Kimberlee placed a hand on her hip and glared at her brother with irritation.

“You what James I’m sick of always dismissing the things I like, well you know what! Since hate girly things so much, I wish you were the girliest girl that ever lived! That were sugar and spice and everything nice!”

The moment Kimberlee finished her rant James noticed out of the corner of his, that the ring on his sister's finger seemed to glow slightly before dying down just as quickly. He suddenly had a very bad feeling.
1421.title: Wishing Ring

choices: James has a strange dream that night
14212.content:
Nothing eventful happened for the rest of the trip and Mills got home without a fuse. But James couldn’t help but feel unease, there was something about Kimblee's ring that put him on edge. He knew it was irrational but he hated the idea of being a girly girl so much that thought of being transformed by his sister's wish was enough to put him on edge.

He kept waiting and dread for some to happen, but as the day went on without a single change, it became easier for James to relax and by dinner, all of James’s worries had faded away.

‘Me a girly girl, like that, will ever happen,’ James thought as he ate his meal.

145.content:
While his family debt on where to go James sneaked away, he knew his mum would be furious with him later on but right now the boy was just to angry to care. That and he really, really didn't want to go clothes shopping.

So once he had put some distance between himself and his family, James was left with time to kill before he had to face the music, so he might as well explore the mall on his own terms. This lead him to….

1453.title: Finding something on the ground

choices: After a while James calms down
Someone is already in the bathroom
145331.content:
James saw a tiny glint the on malls floor, his curiosity stimulated the boy walked over to take a closer look.

It was a silver ring with pink diamond, someone must have dropped. ‘Oh well to bad for them,’ James thought as he turned away, but something kept nagging at him, a strange splinter of curiosity that compelled to take close look at the ring.

Seeing no ham James walked up to the ring and scoped it off the ground, there was something written on it. The words, ‘The Princess Ring,’ had been carved into the perfect smooth silver.

James rolled his eyes, the ring must be a gift made by some super rich guy for his bratty daughter, “Well too bad for them.” James muttered as he opened his hand to drop the ring on the floor.

But then ring started glowing and turned into a silver mist, which wrapped itself around one James fingers and transforming back into a solid object.

“What the hell was that?” James questioned angrily as he tried in vain to pull the ring off but it remained stubbornly on his finger.
“This just great! I’m stuck in this boring place with wearing a girly ring, this sucks!”

James's body started to feel very tingly as the world around him became very blurry. For about a second he stumbled around, when his vision cleared up he felt very strange like part of him were missing and something tickling the of his ears, his neck and shoulders.

He turned around and saw much to her shock that she had been transformed into a girl with long blond, James in response did the most logical thing and screamed at the top of her lungs and duck into the closet boy’s bathroom.
145331.title: The Princess Ring

choices: Juliane turns her attention her surroundings
1453311.content:
After spending some time panicking James was able to calm herself down. As embarrassing as it was, she needed to tell her parents that she had somehow been transformed into a girl. So she reluctantly walked out of boy’s bathroom and began looking for her parents, begin very careful not to draw anyone's attention to herself.

As James looked around she began to feel a usual irritation, it was similar to an itch but not quite, more like something was off and wasn’t the discomfort that was caused by her transformed body which faded strangely quickly.

The source of the strange annoyance became clear the moment James spotted her reflection in a store window. It was the revolting commoner ragus she was wearing, a pair of ugly baggy jeans and a dull white t-shirt, and she had chosen to wear them!

Why? Because it was trendy, maybe back when she was dirty commoner boy, but now James had become elegant lady she needed clothing that would fit a lady of her status. The ring seemed to respond to James wishes, it glowed bright pink. Then James's cloth shifted into beautifully pink fairytale ball gown complete long pink silk opera gloves and elegant heels.


James’s….No that was the name of some filthy commoner boy. Juliane admired her reflection in a store window, she did a little spin causing her beautiful dress to dance gracefully through the air, allowing herself to fully enjoy the expensive fine fabric. Now, these were clothes worthy of Juliane, now truly looked the part of a princess!
1453311.title: After a while James calms down

14533112.content:
After a while Juliane pulled herself away from her beautiful reflection to look around at the strange ugly building filled with unworthy commoners It was then the princess wondered why was she, Juliane didn't want to be here she wanted to in an enchanted castle worthy of fairy tail princess.

The ring on her finger suddenly glowed and.......
14533112.title: Juliane turns her attention her surroundings

15.title: First page version B

151.content: Okay, who comes across this place?
151.title: An abandoned old castle

1512.content:
"Behold Grimsly Castle!" Mike announce in overly dramatic manner, while pointing at the fording ruin. The fourteen old brunette boy had always loved exploring.

"Calm down it is just old ruin," Sarah said with a bored deadpan expression. Unlike Mike was Sarah didn't care much for the out door, she perfected she would rather staying in doors and things like cooking or play video games.

"I don't think this is good idea," Lucy said nervously, she really didn't want to come here, (which was pretty reasonable in this case given that castle was crumbling,) but she always had trouble expressing herself.

"Oh come on Lucy, it is just some dust old building, there is no need to be scary cat," Tom said while rubbing Lucy's head. Tom was big for his age and could be a bit of bully at times but when things really got serious he was loyal friends.

Lucy crossed her arms in annoyance, "I'm not scared," She mumbled while kicking the ground.

"Enough, lets us head inside and begin exploring!" Mike practically jumped through the massive hole in the ruined gate, his friends followed soon after.

The main hall was dark fording, what was once a place fill with life was now ghostly quite, the once might stone wall were now falling away. The bright tapestry's and carpets that decorated the room were now covered in dirt, had many small holes and their colour was fading away.

Just above the main stare case was huge grand dusty painting of noblewoman. She was beautiful with golden hair tied into four ringlets, she wore a elegant dark blue ball gown. Her posture was straight and disciplined, while her eyes where filled with an ice cold fire.

"OK guys," Mike said "Let's...."
1512.title: Some friends

15122.content:
"Let's explore the ground floor," he said.

Honestly, this wasn't typically the place where you'd find a bunch of 14-year olds. Yet, with summer vacation up and rolling, Mike really wanted everyone to come with him to check the castle out while they had the chance. Tom obviously jumped on board immediately, while Sarah was more nonchalant about it. For Lucy, it took a bit of convincing, given how easy it was to scare her. Not that such fears were unfounded. The castle looked like the kind of place you should stay the hell away from.

"Man...I wonder just how many rooms there are," Tom said in awe, hands on his hips all the while.

"Probably way too many," Sarah sighed. "Please don't tell me we're going to explore all of them. I don't have all day."

"I don't think it'll take that long," Mike replied. "Sure, the place is big, but I don't think exploring it will take hours."

"I'd rather not be here for hours..." Lucy shivered. "Seriously, this gives me the creeps."

"We'll be fine. Superstitions just exaggerate everything, right?" Tom chuckled.

Lucy wasn't too convinced, but she didn't argue any further. The group of four continued to move forward on the ground floor, The hallways certainly did their job of making the place seem bigger on the inside than on the outside, even though it all looked as decrepit as everything else. Matt and Tom certainly didn't lose their enthusiasm, while Sarah was kind of playing with her phone all the while. Apparently she still got phone service in here.

On the other hand, Lucy was lagging behind. Seriously, every creak of the castle made her heart jump a bit. In fact, she was focusing so much on the sounds around her that she didn't notice when the others took a turn to the left while she continued to move forward.

"Okay...I really want to go back guys......guys?" Lucy stopped when she heard no reply.

She looked in front of her and behind. The others were nowhere to be seen. Concluding that she somehow lost them while she wasn't paying attention, it only made her panic more.

"Oh no...guys!" she called out.

She looked around, trying to find where exactly she separated from them. There were so many more hallways and rooms than she thought there would be. Perhaps she would have to start looking from room to room. Not a good sign. Groaning, she began looking for everyone, since she heard no reply from her call. Soon enough, she came across a room with an opened door.

"Oh, did they go in there?" Lucy wondered out loud.

Giving it a try, she slowly opened the door further and went inside. It...looked like a room for maids and other such servants you'd find in a castle. Guess this was where such people would go to rest and such. Heck, there were even outfits and whatnot.

"Okay...that's not weird at all...." Lucy said, not really feeling any better here.
15122.title: Lets explore the ground floor

choices: There are some loud knocks at the door.
151221.content:
Lucy couldn't take it anymore this place was getting way too damn creepy. She needed to find the other guys and get out of this castle, the young girl immediately bolt, only for the door to slam shut into her shoulder.

"Aw!" Lucy cried with pain as she rubbed her shoulder, she pulled herself back up and grabbed hold of the door handle. She pulled on it only to find that the door was now tightly jammed, Lucy muscles burned as she tried desperately to get the door to open but it proved futile.

"This can't be happening!" Shout in frustration and sat on an old wooden stool.

Then some both bizarre and terrifying happened a woman appeared from the wall and approached Lucy.

She was young and plain looking, with short hair and a modest appearance and was wearing a maid outfit. But non of those things were important, no what really mattered was the fact woman was completely translucent as Lucy could see the wall behind her, the maid was a ghost.

Lucy fell off the stool and screamed at the top of her lungs for about minute, after she ran out off steam the maid....
151221.title: Lucy in the maid's room

1553323.content:
In this case a never before seen story of some sort as it of course was either all about professional wrestling or King Kong.

This is pro wrestling: A hilarious story that's like the 1984 comedy movie This is Spinal Tap but in this case it takes place in a family friendly like setting as it's about a documentary crew who happen to be filming a documentary about pro wrestling itself.

Dog Kong Meets King Kong: A family friendly comedy story that happens to be a parody or spoof of King Kong as Hansel the husky from 101 Dalmatian Street stars in the titular role of Dog Kong a giant anthropomorphic version of himself who happens to be nice friendly heroic and quite a hunk of a giant monster as well, as he'll eventually go up against the 8th wonder of the world King Kong himself as the cast of 101 Dalmatian Street also will be starring in this comedy story including Dolly Dalmatian herself as she'll have the role of being not only Dog Kong's love interest and lady love but also she'll be a damsel in distress not once but twice as Dog Kong will come to her rescue not once but twice.
1553323.title: Something else
